text: Catopsilia is a genus of butterflies in the family Pieridae, commonly called migrants or emigrants. ==Species== Ordered alphabetically.Catopsilia, funet.fi *Catopsilia florella (Fabricius, 1775) – African emigrant, African migrant, or common vagrant *Catopsilia gorgophone (Boisduval, 1836) – yellow migrant *Catopsilia pomona (Fabricius, 1775) – common emigrant or lemon emigrant *Catopsilia pyranthe (Linnaeus, 1758) – mottled emigrant or white migrant *Catopsilia scylla (Linnaeus, 1763) – orange emigrant or orange migrant *Catopsilia thauruma (Reakirt, 1866) – Madagascar migrant ==References== ==External links== *Catopsilia Category:Coliadinae Category:Pieridae genera Category:Taxa named by Jacob Hübner
title: Catopsilia
